text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/artifact-comment-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
documentation DocumentationThe comment is providing additional documentation from an authoring perspective
review ReviewThe comment is providing feedback from a reviewer and requires resolution
guidance GuidanceThe comment is providing usage guidance to an artifact consumer

name: ArtifactCommentType
title: Artifact comment type
description: The type of artifact comment (documentation, review, guidance)

concept.definition: The comment is providing additional documentation from an authoring perspective
The comment is providing feedback from a reviewer and requires resolution
The comment is providing usage guidance to an artifact consumer
